description:
Enjoy a unique take on medieval warfare in Zen
Studios’ light-hearted action-strategy game –
enhanced with new features designed specifically
for Nintendo Switch™! As rival fortresses attack
your own, you’ll use a ballista to fling an
assortment of weapons at enemy towers and spear
approaching enemies, while sending your own troops
and unleashing powerful spells. Battling opposing
units up-close as an individual hero nicely
balances the ranged combat, and CastleStorm’s
goofy characters and richly detailed graphics keep
it an enchanting experience throughout.

CastleStorm on Nintendo Switch includes the
original campaign and two additional expansions:
“From Outcast to Savior” and “The Warrior Queen”.

Nintendo Switch features include:

- Touch-screen controls
- Motion-controlled camera movement
- Support for two Joy-Con™ controllers in
splitscreen mode
- HD Rumble
- Nintendo Switch Pro Controller support
- 60 frames per second at 1080p resolution while
docked
- 60 frames per second at 720p resolution in
handheld mode
name: CastleStorm
